data.name: HuntForOut
data.detailed_description:
HuntForOut is a survival FPS game, where your main goal is to get out from The Labyrinth before it collapses. You need to collect special, holy cat parts, different runes, and much more to exit from this horrific maze. The task won't be easy; there are a lot of dangers in this mysterious place, and the walls are always moving to harden your way…

HuntForOut is in development from the spring of 2021 and soon it will be available to download from Steam.

See you soon adventurers!

data.short_description: HuntForOut is a survival FPS game, where your main goal is to get out from The Labyrinth before it collapses. The task won't be easy; there are a lot of dangers in this mysterious place, and the walls are always moving to harden your way…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 4600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 8700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
